moves.3... Nf6: considered weak: Bc5, and then Nf6...
moves.4. Ng5: here is why: f7 is under pressure...
moves.5. exd5 Nxd5: not the best: best is Na5, Bb5+, c6, dxc6, bxc6, Qf3!...
moves.6. Nxf7: the Fegatello attack: Fischer called this the Fried Liver attack...
moves.6... Kxf7 7. Qf3+ Ke6: hard to believe: but this is the best reply...
moves.8... Ncb4: a pity: best was Nce7: Black is trying to capitalize on pawn c2...

opening: two knights defence (C57), Fegatello attack, Leonhardt variation
